title: Coming Soon... Our Sci-Fi Radio Drama
dc:creator: WBUR
description: This Friday, Endless Thread releases one of its wackiest, most ambitious episodes yet: a sci-fi radio drama based on a movie script, based on a Reddit thread about a mysterious interstellar object. Hold on to your butts...
itunes:author: WBUR
